channel.title: Where can i add a npc in the source so it stays forever?
channel.description:
Where can i add a npc in the source so it stays forever?
Hybrid pvp v3 source
Im dutch btw.

item.title: Where can i add a npc in the source so it stays forever?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“Impactz, post:3, topic:423831”][quote author=The Outsider link=topic=526486.msg3835034#msg3835034 date=1322840424]
Do you have a data folder? There should be something along the lines of “auto-spawn.cfg” or “spawn.cfg”.
[/quote]

I found spawn-config

// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description
spawn = 1158 3490 9512 0 1 56 350 300 1 //Kalphite Queen

Where do i typ the id of a monster?[/quote]

spawn = npcid Xcoordinate Ycoordinate height walkType(0, 1 or 2) maxhit attacklevel defencelevel//name

Remember to use TAB in between numbers.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i add a npc in the source so it stays forever?

item.title: Where can i add a npc in the source so it stays forever?
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

The Outsider:

Do you have a data folder? There should be something along the lines of “auto-spawn.cfg” or “spawn.cfg”.

I found spawn-config

// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description
spawn = 1158 3490 9512 0 1 56 350 300 1 //Kalphite Queen

Where do i typ the id of a monster?

Read full topic
